mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members (account_number, address, email, phone_number, password, birth_date, name, profile_image_url, ssafy_user_key, bank) VALUES (#{accountNumber}, #{address}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{password}, #{birthDate}, #{name}, #{profileImageUrl}, #{userKey}, #{bank})
mapper.select: SELECT member_id AS memberId, account_number AS accountNumber, address, email, phone_number AS phoneNumber, password, birth_date AS birthDate, name, profile_image_url AS profileImageUrl, ssafy_user_key AS userKey, bank AS bank FROM members WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
